windows.tableModels

Class MyOffersTableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • windows.tableModels.MyOffersTableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel

    public class MyOffersTableModel
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
    Table model for the tables used to present the offers from a specific user. It has six columns:
    • ZIP code
    • Starting date
    • Price
    • Average rating
    • Type of offer
    • Satus of the offer
    Author:
    Miguel Arconada (miguel.arconada@estudiante.uam.es) Alberto Gonzalez (alberto.gonzalezk@estudiante.uam.es)
    See Also:
